job.title: Staff Software Engineer, Sync
job.industry: Computer & Network Security,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description: Okta is the leading independent provider of enterprise identity The Okta Identity Cloud enables organizations to securely connect the right people to the right technologies at the right time With over 6500 prebuilt integrations to applications and infrastructure providers Okta customers can easily and securely use the best technologies for their business Over 7950 organizations including 20th Century Fox JetBlue Nordstrom Slack Teach for America and Twilio trust Okta to help protect the identities of their workforces and customersbrbrThe vision is to make Okta the de facto provider of the cloud identity and access management and help customer migrate to cloud based identity and access management solutionbrbrWe are looking for an experienced software engineer to join the Sync engineering team that builds common services for importing and syncing user device and entitlement data These features allow customers the flexibility to link or enhance their business processes with Oktas identity management productbrWe are looking for smart innovative and passionate engineers to join the team and help craft the future of Identity Management in the era of cloudbrbrYou will share our passion and great pride in elegant solutions and will join an engineering team that strongly believes in designing for scale rigorous code reviews automated testing and an iterative process to build highquality next generation enterprise softwarebrbrOur elite team is fast innovative and flexible with a weekly agile release cycle and individual ownership We expect great things from our engineers and reward them with stimulating new projects emerging technologies and the chance to have significant equity in a company that is changing the cloud computing landscape foreverbrbrstronguJob Duties And Responsibilitiesbrustrongul liWork with senior engineering team in major development projects design and implementationli liBe a key contributor in the implementation of the sync infrastructureli liConduct code reviews analysis and performance tuningli liProvide technical leadership and mentorship to more junior engineersli liLead and conduct design and code reviewsli liImplement unit and functional testsli liInterface with Architects QA Product Owners Engineering Services Tech Opsli brbrulstronguMinimum REQUIRED Knowledge Skills And Abilitiesbrustrongul li4 years software development experience in an objectoriented language li liExperience building fast reliable applications at an enterprise scaleli liExcellent grasp of software engineering principlesli liDeep understanding of infrastructure level technologies caching stream processing resilient architecturesli liExperience working with relational databases ideally MySQLli cloud computing services such as AWSli liKnowledge of network security encryption authentication and authorization a plusli brbrulstronguEducation And Trainingbrustrongul liBachelors or Masters Degree majoring in computer scienceli brbrulOkta is an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrOkta is rethinking the traditional work environment providing our employees with the flexibility to be their most creative
